alert.note: Alert for Central St. Louis; North Itasca; North St. Louis (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 29 at 3:58PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Itasca and west central St. Louis Counties through 430 PM CDT... At 357 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southeast of Togo, or 21 miles north of Hibbing, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Meadow Brook around 410 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Cook, Gheen and Lake Vermilion. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, especially near Lake Vermilion, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central St. Louis; North Itasca; North St. Louis
